section.title: Assessments
section.text:
The Patient was found to have Anemia and Dr Seven and his staff diagnosed the condition and treated
Ms Rebecca for Anemia during the 2 day stay at Community Health Hospitals. Ms Rebecca recovered
from Anemia during the stay and is being discharged in a stable condition. If there is fever
greater than 101.5 or onset of chest pain/breathlessness the patient is advised to contact
emergency.

tr.td:
a. Need to gain more energy to do regular activities
b. Negotiated Goal to eep Body Temperature at 98-99 degrees
Fahrenheit with regular monitoring.
